item.title: Help Me: Pnpc command wont work? :s
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

in my server coded from base of pimpscape i cant get pnpc to work, it used to so i must messed summit up

here is the command

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }

but i type ::pnpc 1552

which is santa and it wont work, i tryed other npcs too

Read full topic
